alert.note: Alert for Tate (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 3:22PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Tate County through 400 PM CDT... At 322 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Coldwater, or near Senatobia, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Senatobia, Coldwater, Looxahoma, Poagville, Crossroad, New Town and Bluff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
